description: Ms. leaves. Physical description: Written in naskhi script in black on white European glazed, laid paper. Rubrication and catchword.
abstract: Prayer in Arabic for Laylat al-Barāʾah, the Night of Salvation (15 Shaʻbān) with explanation in Ottoman Turkish; apparently in the hand of the famous Turkish calligrapher İsmail Hakkı Altunbezer (1873-1946).
title: Leyle-yi Baraetin duası beyanında dır ki şehr-i Şabanın on beşinci gecesi dir
subject: Islam—Prayers and devotions
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
